name: using_path_parameters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ai_tool_gpt_token_splitter.
Tool description: This REST API service provides a way to programmatically split GPT-3 text-prompts into user-defined token-sized slices.
API description: This function makes a request to an API endpoint to split a given text based on specified parameters and returns the response.

text.description: The input text to be split.

max_size.description: The maximum size limit for the split text. Defaults to 1024.

delimiter.description: The delimiter to be used for splitting the text. Defaults to None.

include_variations.description: Whether to include variations in the splitting process. Defaults to None.
